title: Happy Birthday, Ruby-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Let’s see.... This is for Hanamaru-chan, and this one is for Yoshiko-chan. Then this one is for Kasumi-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ruby?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, Onee-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Are you still up? We will all gather for your birthday party today, so don’t stay up too late, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Okay, Ruby just finished preparing things.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Preparing.... things?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. Ruby made thank you notes for everyone that’ll come celebrate my birthday. This one’s for you, Onee-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ruby....! You’ve grown up into such a sweet girl....!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Uwaaah!? O-, Onee-chan? It hurts....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Let me stay like this for a little longer. I’m glad to see you become such a wonderful person. Happy birthday, Ruby. I’m so proud to have you as my little sister....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
